resources.string:
When the frame drawing time exceeds 16ms, the frame is dropped. When the frame is dropped to a certain level, the user will be visually stuck. At this time, the small ball will turn red, and there will be a notification prompt. Re-enter the interface to see The stack information collected. If the default stack collection settings does not reflect visual clicks, you can double-click the small ball to open the settings dialog for setting. In addition to the stack collection settings, there are also switch settings for flow detection. Welcome to use. If you encounter problems, you can post an issue on github.
Tap on each reference row for more details, tap again to close.
Are you sure you want to delete all drop frames ?
